sentences.en: The conscripts were treated as cannon fodder.
sentences.cn: 征召入伍的士兵被当作炮灰。

sentences.en: This story will be more fodder for the gossip columnists.
sentences.cn: 这个传闻会是闲谈专栏作家的又一素材。

sentences.en: The press conference simply provided more fodder for another attack on his character.
sentences.cn: 记者招待会只是提供更多的素材，来对他人格进行另一轮攻击。
